verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Command <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H853>them,<s%> My <S%H7133>offering,<s%> and my <S%H3899>bread<s%> for my sacrifices made by <S%H801>fire,<s%> for a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savor<s%> unto me, shall ye <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H7126>offer<s%> unto me in their due <S%H4150>season.<s%>

And thou shalt <S%H559>say<s%> unto them, <S%H2088>This<s%> is the offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> ye shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3532>lambs<s%> of the <S%H1121>first<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> without <S%H8549>spot<s%> day by <S%H3117>day,<s%> for a <S%H8548>continual<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offering.<s%>

<S%H853><s%> The <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3532>lamb<s%> shalt thou <S%H6213>offer<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H3532>lamb<s%> shalt thou <S%H6213>offer<s%> <S%H996>at<s%> <S%H6153>even;<s%>

And a <S%H6224>tenth<s%> part of an <S%H374>ephah<s%> of <S%H5560>flour<s%> for a meat <S%H4503>offering,<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> part of a <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H3795>beaten<s%> <S%H8081>oil.<s%>

It is a <S%H8548>continual<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> which was <S%H6213>ordained<s%> in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai<s%> for a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savor,<s%> a sacrifice made by <S%H801>fire<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And the drink <S%H5262>offering<s%> thereof shall be the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> part of a <S%H1969>hin<s%> for the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3532>lamb:<s%> in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place shalt thou cause the strong <S%H7941>wine<s%> to be <S%H5258>poured<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> for a drink <S%H5262>offering.<s%>

And the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H3532>lamb<s%> shalt thou <S%H6213>offer<s%> <S%H996>at<s%> <S%H6153>even:<s%> as the meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> of the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and as the drink <S%H5262>offering<s%> thereof, thou shalt <S%H6213>offer<s%> it, a sacrifice made by <S%H801>fire,<s%> of a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savor<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And on the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3532>lambs<s%> of the <S%H1121>first<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> without <S%H8549>spot,<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> tenth <S%H6241>deals<s%> of <S%H5560>flour<s%> for a meat <S%H4503>offering,<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and the drink <S%H5262>offering<s%> thereof:
This is the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> of every <S%H7676>sabbath,<s%> <S%H7676><s%> <S%H5921>beside<s%> the <S%H8548>continual<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> and his drink <S%H5262>offering.<s%>

And in the <S%H7218>beginnings<s%> of your <S%H2320>months<s%> ye shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> a burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H1241><s%> <S%H6499>bullocks,<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H352>ram,<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3532>lambs<s%> of the <S%H1121>first<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> without <S%H8549>spot;<s%>

And <S%H7969>three<s%> tenth <S%H6241>deals<s%> of <S%H5560>flour<s%> for a meat <S%H4503>offering,<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H8081>oil,<s%> for <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6499>bullock;<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> tenth <S%H6241>deals<s%> of <S%H5560>flour<s%> for a meat <S%H4503>offering,<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H8081>oil,<s%> for <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H352>ram;<s%>

And a several tenth <S%H6241>deal<s%> <S%H6241><s%> of <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%> for a meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> unto <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3532>lamb;<s%> for a burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> of a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savor,<s%> a sacrifice made by <S%H801>fire<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And their drink <S%H5262>offerings<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H2677>half<s%> a <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H3196>wine<s%> unto a <S%H6499>bullock,<s%> and the <S%H7992>third<s%> part of a <S%H1969>hin<s%> unto a <S%H352>ram,<s%> and a <S%H7243>fourth<s%> part of a <S%H1969>hin<s%> unto a <S%H3532>lamb:<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> is the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> of every <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H2320><s%> throughout the <S%H2320>months<s%> of the <S%H8141>year.<s%>

And <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8163>kid<s%> of the <S%H5795>goats<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall be <S%H6213>offered,<s%> <S%H5921>beside<s%> the <S%H8548>continual<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> and his drink <S%H5262>offering.<s%>
And in the <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> is the <S%H6453>passover<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And in the <S%H2568>fifteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> is the <S%H2282>feast:<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> shall unleavened <S%H4682>bread<s%> be <S%H398>eaten.<s%>

In the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> shall be a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation;<s%> ye shall <S%H6213>do<s%> no <S%H3808>manner<s%> <S%H3605><s%> of <S%H5656>servile<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%> therein:

But ye shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> a sacrifice made by <S%H801>fire<s%> for a burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H1241><s%> <S%H6499>bullocks,<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H352>ram,<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3532>lambs<s%> of the <S%H1121>first<s%> <S%H8141>year:<s%> they shall <S%H1961>be<s%> unto you without blemish: <S%H8549><s%>

And their meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> shall be of <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H8081>oil:<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> tenth <S%H6241>deals<s%> shall ye <S%H6213>offer<s%> for a <S%H6499>bullock,<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> tenth <S%H6241>deals<s%> for a <S%H352>ram;<s%>
A several tenth <S%H6241>deal<s%> <S%H6241><s%> shalt thou <S%H6213>offer<s%> for <S%H259>every<s%> <S%H3532>lamb,<s%> throughout the <S%H7651>seven<s%> lambs: <S%H3532><s%>
And <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8163>goat<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> to make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> you.

Ye shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H4480>beside<s%> <S%H905><s%> the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is for a <S%H8548>continual<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offering.<s%>

After this <S%H428>manner<s%> ye shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> <S%H3117>daily,<s%> throughout the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> the <S%H3899>meat<s%> of the sacrifice made by <S%H801>fire,<s%> of a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savor<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> it shall be <S%H6213>offered<s%> <S%H5921>beside<s%> the <S%H8548>continual<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> and his drink <S%H5262>offering.<s%>

And on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> ye shall <S%H1961>have<s%> a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation;<s%> ye shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H5656>servile<s%> <S%H4399>work.<s%>

Also in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H1061>firstfruits,<s%> when ye <S%H7126>bring<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> after your <S%H7620>weeks<s%> be out, ye shall <S%H1961>have<s%> a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation;<s%> ye shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H5656>servile<s%> work: <S%H4399><s%>

But ye shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> for a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savor<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H1241><s%> <S%H6499>bullocks,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H352>ram,<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3532>lambs<s%> of the <S%H1121>first<s%> <S%H8141>year;<s%>

And their meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> of <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H8081>oil,<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> tenth <S%H6241>deals<s%> unto <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6499>bullock,<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> tenth <S%H6241>deals<s%> unto <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H352>ram,<s%>
A several tenth <S%H6241>deal<s%> <S%H6241><s%> unto <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3532>lamb,<s%> throughout the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3532>lambs;<s%>
And <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8163>kid<s%> of the <S%H5795>goats,<s%> to make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> you.

Ye shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> them <S%H4480>beside<s%> <S%H905><s%> the <S%H8548>continual<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> and his meat <S%H4503>offering,<s%> (they shall <S%H1961>be<s%> unto you without <S%H8549>blemish)<s%> and their drink <S%H5262>offerings.<s%>
